title: Bohemian Rhapsody
description: A progressive rock anthem that combines ballad, opera, and hard rock elements, becoming one of the most iconic songs of all time.

title: Billie Jean
description: A defining song in the career of Michael Jackson that showcases his signature style and dance moves, from the album 'Thriller'.

title: Shape of You
description: A chart-topping track blending tropical house and pop, centered around a catchy beat and lyrics about infatuation.

title: Smells Like Teen Spirit
description: An anthem of the 1990s alternative rock movement, this song catapulted Nirvana to fame and became synonymous with grunge culture.

title: Rolling in the Deep
description: A powerful ballad by Adele, combining elements of blues and pop, and showcasing her incredible vocal range.

title: Hotel California
description: A rock masterpiece known for its mysterious lyrics and legendary guitar solos, embodying the essence of 1970s rock music.

title: Blinding Lights
description: A hit song that mixes 80s-inspired synthwave with contemporary pop, setting a modern trend in music with its catchy beat.

title: Imagine
description: A timeless song by John Lennon, promoting unity and peace, often considered one of the greatest songs of all time.

title: Take On Me
description: A popular synthpop hit with a distinctive high-pitched vocal performance and innovative animated music video.

title: Hey Jude
description: One of The Beatles' most iconic songs, known for its singalong chorus and uplifting message.
